text.text:
Manufacturer: IBM
Released: 1981
The IBM Personal Computer, or IBM PC, is the original version and progenitor of the PC compatible hardware platform.
The initial release was on August 12, 1981 with the IBM model 5150.
It was created by a team of engineers and designers under the direction of Don Estridge of the IBM Entry Systems Division in Boca Raton, Florida.
